data.comment: The match is underway in London.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Ilias Chair.
In the minute 15, Ilias Chair for QPR has been booked by Andy Woolmer and receives a first yellow card.
Joe Ralls (Cardiff) has received a yellow card from Andy Woolmer.
Todd Kane puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 31, Geoff Cameron for QPR has been booked by Andy Woolmer and receives a first yellow card.
Cardiff's Leandro Bacuna has been booked in London.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
QPR's Todd Kane has been booked in London.
The second-half is underway at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
Junior Hoilett is replacing Will Vaulks for Cardiff at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
In the minute 48, At Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium, Yoann Barbet has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Cardiff are back in the match in London. A Joe Ralls penalty has made the score 2-1.
Chris Willock is on a sub for Albert Adomah for QPR.
In the minute 67, Neil Harris is making the team's second substitution at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium with Lee Tomlin replacing Josh Murphy.
Lee Tomlin is booked for the away team.
The home team replace Ilias Chair with Dominic Ball.
In the minute 85, Joe Ralls is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
That's full-time at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium. The final score is 3-2.
QPR take a 3-2 lead thanks to Dominic Ball.
Mark Warburton (QPR) is making a third substitution, with Macauley Bonne replacing Bright Osayi-Samuel.
The away team have replaced Leandro Bacuna with Mark Harris. This is the third substitution made today by Neil Harris.
